name: Eye Of Plunder
description:
The legend of the Land of Fortune says:
"When a person is very greedy, he needs to be careful about the
Purple Plunder, he can carry all his treasures".
You control a creature called Purple Plunder,
you have the power of teleportation and need
teach that money is not everything to the most greedy creatures
and get all the gold you can get.
The Purple Plunder race: One-eyed creatures that look like starfish or spiders ,
can teleport and love to pick up gold from the greedy.

Eye Of Plunder is an arcade labyrinth style game where you can
teleport to escape from enemies.
Each level you complete the game becomes harder and more enemies appear.
The levels are created randomly to make the adventure more fun.

  • Levels with Procedural generation.
  • Levels increased with progress.
  • Enemies have artificial intelligence.
  • You can teleport your character.
  • Retro Arcade Style.
  • Take the gold of the greedy enemies.
